name: woolly

woolly adjective
(OF WOOL)
Add to word list

woolly adjective
(NOT CLEAR)
mainly UK disapproving Woolly ideas and thinking are confused and not clear, and have not been considered carefully enough: It's the woolly thinking behind the book that I find so infuriating. I can't stand these woolly-headed/-minded liberals!
